description:
George and Domon are set to fight each other, but the King of Neo France says there is no need, so he locks up Gundam Rose. However, George`s feelings are so strong he steals Gundam Rose and challenges Domon to a fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Knight`s Pride! Gundam Rose Stolen
Der Stolz eines Ritters! Der gestohlene Gundam Rose
Kishi no Hokori! Ubawareta Gundam Rose
L’honneur du chevalier ! On a volé le Gundam Rose
騎士の誇り! 奪われたガンダムローズ
